data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Raški, Serbia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Raški, Serbia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Raški against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 139 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,549 believers in Raški that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Raški, Serbia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Turk people. Make the Turk people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Raški, Serbia.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Raški unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Raški, Serbia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 352,451 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
